contest-event.event-date:
May 21, 1955 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Rhapsody in Brass Belle Vue (Kings Hall), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prize: 1st: £75 Plus The Daily Express Challenge Shield 2nd: £50 Plus The Belle Vue 100 Guineas Challenge Trophy 3rd: £30 4th: £15 March 30, 2011, 4:16 p.m. May 10, 2013, 9:04 p.m. 1 Markham Main Colliery Band Edwin Griffiths 2 Marston Valley Band George Crossland 3 Appleby Frodingham Works William H. Kendall 4 Hawick Saxhorn Band James Amos Unknown Result Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) J. E. Pearson Unknown Result Irwell Springs Trevor Walmsley Unknown Result Prince-Smith and Stells Silver Band Reubon Lightfoot Unknown Result Lindley Band Peter Wadsworth Unknown Result Slaithwaite Band Noel Thorpe Unknown Result Blackhall Colliery George Jacobs Unknown Result Crossley's Carpet Works John Harrison Unknown Result Stanley Newmarket Colliery Band Tom Atkinson Unknown Result Finedon Old Prize Band A.
